permission.denied:
You do not have permission to use this command.
Reason: {reason}

reason.rowner: This command can only be used by the server owner.
reason.owner: This command can only be used by the bot owner.
reason.admin: This command can only be used by group admin.
reason.premium: This command can only be used by premium users.
reason.group: This command can only be used in groups.
reason.private: This command can only be used in private messages.
